nexoclom2.atomicdata.load_emission_rate_coefs
=============================================

.. py:module:: nexoclom2.atomicdata.load_emission_rate_coefs

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Extract and save emission rate coefficients from CHIANTI database

   Extracts electron impact excitation rate coefficients for electron densities
   and temperatures relevant to the Io torus.

   This is not intended to be run by users and is included here for documentation.
   ChiantiPy is not a dependency on nexoclom2 and must be installed by the user
   for this to work.

   ..
       !! processed by numpydoc !!
